attributes.additional_details:
Before all these taxes our country was the most prosperous in the world with no national debt. We call on the Government to review ALL taxes.

Accounts Receivable Tax
Airline surcharge tax
Airline Fuel Tax
Airport Maintenance Tax
Building Permit Tax
Cigarette Tax
Cooking Tax

Driving Permit Tax
Environmental Tax (Fee)

Petrol Tax (too much per litre)
Gross Receipts Tax
Health Tax
Heating Tax
Inheritance Tax
Interest Tax
Lighting Tax
Liquor Tax
uxury Taxes

Mortgage Tax

Property Tax
